summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.1°C) and outside temperature (down 1.8°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1766 m), feels like temperature (up 5.0°C), outside temperature (up 3.8°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 302.7m lower than yesterday, 1221.5m lower than past week, 1766.5m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 963.0m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
